overview: Incredible coverage of 4 years in the office of the Swedish foreign minister, Margot Wallstr√∂m, known for her fearless feminist agenda and sharp, empathic mind. We witness her arduous negotiations with Saudi Arabia, Israel and South Korea, as well as a highly competitive campaign for a seat in the UNSC, followed by a crash course in keeping it cool in the face of death threats and intimidation.
title: The Feminister
